notes: Managed and educated 30 total lab sessions covering concepts like basic memory management, recursion, and objects in C++.
Collaborated with six teaching assistants and three instructors to create course content for over 300 students as supplemental teaching aids.
Hosted over 60 one-on-one sessions with students addressing bugs in assignments, deeper learning of concepts, and demonstrations of programming assignments.
Evaluated student performance and conceptual knowledge in written quizzes and code demonstrations.
